title: Unified Remote Full v3.0.23
description:
Description
Easily the most feature-filled computer remote. Turns your device into a WiFi or Bluetooth universal remote control for your Windows PC. Mac and Linux support also available (beta). Control your favorite programs, mouse, and keyboard.
Server: www.unifiedremote.com

Key Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easy server and app setup, that just works. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Loaded with remotes to control many media applications, tools, system settings, etc. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Basic Input remote to control mouse and keyboard. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic server detection to easily find servers on your network. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Server password protection and encryption for added security. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports single and multi-touch mouse control. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Wake On LAN to easily start your server. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Includes light and dark color themes. 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Server is available for Windows, Mac (Beta), and Linux (Beta).

Permissions:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ INTERNET: for server connection.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ BLUETOOTH: for server connection.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ WAKE_LOCK: for optional wake-lock.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ READ_PHONE_STATE: for auto-pause.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: for server connection.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ VIBRATE: for optional haptic feedback.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: for server connection.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ NFC: for NFC actions.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ INSTALL_SHORTCUT: for launcher shortcuts.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ CHECK_LICENSE: for licensing checking.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TRANSMIT_IR: for IR remote control.
